      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_519</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_519</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ecuaciones de las cónicas. Traslación y giros de ejes. Ejercicios y problemas</string>
            <string language="en">The equations of conic sections. Translations and rotations of axes. Exercises and problems.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gleichungen der Kegelschnitte. 
Übersetzungen und Umdrehungen der Äxte. Übungen und 
Probleme.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les équations des sections coniques. 
Traductions et rotations des haches. Exercices et 
problèmes.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As equações de seções cónicas. 
Traduções e rotações dos machados. Exercícios e 
problemas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le equazioni delle sezioni conic. 
Traduzioni e rotazioni delle ascie. Esercitazioni e 
problemi.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι εξισώσεις των κωνικών τμημάτων. Μεταφράσεις 
και περιστροφές των αξόνων. Ασκήσεις και προβλήματα.</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de curvas cónicas. Se estudian las ecuaciones de las diferentes curvas y los efectos de las traslaciones de ejes en sus ecuaciones.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of conic sections, studying the different types of curve and the effects of translating the axes on their equations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cónicas</string>
            <string language="en">conic sections</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">traslación</string>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipérbola</string>
            <string language="en">hyperbola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">parábola</string>
            <string language="en">parabola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">elipse</string>
            <string language="en">ellipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch Simulationen, 
das Konzept der Kegelschnitte zu erklären, die unterschiedlichen 
Typen der Kurve und die Effekte des Übersetzens der Äxte auf ihren 
Gleichungen studierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations simulations 
d'expliquer le concept des sections coniques, étudiant les 
différents types de courbe et les effets de traduire les haches sur 
leurs équations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar o 
conceito de seções cónicas, estudando os tipos diferentes de curva 
e os efeitos de traduzir os machados em suas equações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare il 
concetto delle sezioni conic, studiante i tipi differenti di curve e 
gli effetti di traduzione delle ascie sulle loro equazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια των κωνικών τμημάτων, μελετώντας τους 
διαφορετικούς τύπους καμπυλών και τα αποτελέσματα της μετάφρασης 
των αξόνων στις εξισώσεις τους.</string>
          </description>
